summary: Two strangers help each other survive a night of great loss.
cast: Yves Montand|Romy Schneider|Romolo Valli|Lila Kedrova|Heinz Bennent|Roberto Benigni|Dieter Schidor|Catherine Allégret|François Perrot|Daniel Mesguich|Gabriel Jabbour|Hans Verner|Jean-Claude Bouillaud|Eliane Borras|Gabriel Dussurget|Isabelle Bucaille|Jean-François Gobbi|Béatrice Costantini|Fanny Delbrice|André Dumas|Jacques Dynam|Michèle Lituac|Philippe Manesse|Jean-Pierre Rambal|Jean Reno|Michel Robin|Katia Romanoff|Jacques Sempey|Mireille Pame|Bob Castella|Giuliana Calandra|Margherita Ciboldi|Miranda Campa|Ibrahim Seck|Antonia Berkof|Pierre Cheremetieff
title: Una mujer singular
